code: import axios from'axios';export var LOCALSTORAGE_KEY='_DEMO_TOKEN';export var TOKEN=window.localStorage.getItem(LOCALSTORAGE_KEY);export var API=axios.create({baseURL:'https://eindwerk.jnnck.be/'});if(TOKEN){API.defaults.headers.common['Authorization']="Bearer ".concat(TOKEN);console.log('TOKEN uit API.js',TOKEN);}
